H0.text: Which US President has a statue in Parliament Square. Abraham Lincoln

H1.text: Which US President has a statue in Parliament Square. Franklin D. Roosevelt

H2.text: Which US President has a statue in Parliament Square. George Washington

H3.text: Which US President has a statue in Parliament Square. KENNEDY

A4.text: A recasting of a statue of Abraham Lincoln stands in Parliament Square, London, and Parque Lincoln, Mexico City.
